<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Analysis pass that exposes the \\c IVUsers for a loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ivusersanalysis"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ivusersanalysis">IVUsersAnalysis</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysisinfomixin">AnalysisInfoMixin</a>&lt;IVUsersAnalysis&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/analysiskey">AnalysisKey</a> Key;</Highlight></CodeLine>
